title: Seeing Spots
description: The story of one man's obsession with spots... and where his obsession leads.Dare Greene and Kathy Parrish have longed for each other since high school, but their own insecurities have kept them apart. One day, a glimpse of a leopard-spotted bra changes everything between them. But are they prepared for ALL the changes they'll experience together?A contemporary romantic comedy with a paranormal twist. Length: Novella (20,000 words)
author: Ellen Fisher
